attributes.action: Bring Back the Death Penalty - We Need To Match Todays Crimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i beleive we should bring back the death penalty, to prevent murderes, child abusers walking the streets with  our children, the uk law is far too soft and lenient with crime nowadays, the law needs to be punishement not a slap on the wrist, we need this law back, the crimes against children are worsening, we need to change with the times and match the crime, we need this back before the uk crime becomes out of control, this would most certainly help deter voilence, the crime are becoming more voilent and the punishment needs to match, I do not want my tax money being thrown to these criminals to give them new identities, like for example little Jamie bulgar, why are we paying fo them, what about baby p?  what about all those babies, the murderes are only serving a few years, those boys had their whole lives ahead of them, all taken away, and what do the murderers get, a measly few years, they should at least serve out the remainding of the murdered victims years that could of been, at the very least, but no they dont serve hardly anything nowadays, we need to get match the crime, uk law is a joke, we need to get serious, please..

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
